entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 06:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
